attributes.action: urge the BBC into making Stuart Hall a commentator at the World Cup in 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Stuart Hall is the most talented commentator available to cover the World Cup. His poetic prose are a far cry from the dull duddery we will otherwise be forced to listen to. There should be at least a 'red button' option to listen to some interesting and creative commentry by Mr Hall.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
